comments.body: If the default is `null` then we should be able to assign `null` to `threshold` :wink:

I've changed it to `number | null` but it's unclear to me in what sense the default was ever `null`. This looks more like the original author not understanding the distinction between `null` and `undefined`.
The original author was me :wink: So I just overlooked the part of `null` because of just copy and pasting the JSDoc strings from the original repository
